00036 #ifndef __btkRigidRegistration_h
00037 #define __btkRigidRegistration_h
00038 
00039 #include "itkImageRegistrationMethod.h"
00040 #include "itkRegularStepGradientDescentOptimizer.h"
00041 #include "itkLinearInterpolateImageFunction.h"
00042 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00043 #include "itkCenteredTransformInitializer.h"
00044 
00045 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00046 
00047 #include "itkMattesMutualInformationImageToImageMetric.h"
00048 #include "itkMeanSquaresImageToImageMetric.h"
00049 #include "itkNormalizedCorrelationImageToImageMetric.h"
00050 
00051 #include "itkNumericTraits.h"
00052 #include "btkUserMacro.h"
00053 
00054 #include "itkCommand.h"
00055 
00056 #ifndef __CommandIterationUpdate
00057 #define __CommandIterationUpdate
00058 
00059 class CommandIterationUpdate : public itk::Command
00060 {
00061 public:
00062   typedef  CommandIterationUpdate   Self;
00063   typedef  itk::Command             Superclass;
00064   typedef itk::SmartPointer<Self>  Pointer;
00065   itkNewMacro( Self );
00066 protected:
00067   CommandIterationUpdate() {};
00068 public:
00069   typedef itk::RegularStepGradientDescentOptimizer     OptimizerType;
00070   typedef   const OptimizerType   *    OptimizerPointer;
00071 
00072   void Execute(itk::Object *caller, const itk::EventObject & event)
00073     {
00074       Execute( (const itk::Object *)caller, event);
00075     }
00076 
00077   void Execute(const itk::Object * object, const itk::EventObject & event)
00078     {
00079       OptimizerPointer optimizer =
00080         dynamic_cast< OptimizerPointer >( object );
00081       if( ! itk::IterationEvent().CheckEvent( &event ) )
00082         {
00083         return;
00084         }
00085       std::cout << optimizer->GetCurrentIteration() << "   ";
00086       std::cout << optimizer -> GetCurrentStepLength() << "   ";
00087       std::cout << optimizer->GetValue() << "   ";
00088 
00089       std::cout << optimizer->GetCurrentPosition() << std::endl;
00090     }
00091 };
00092 
00093 #endif
00094 
00095 namespace btk
00096 {
00097 
00098 using namespace itk;
00099 
00109 template <typename TImage>
00110 class RigidRegistration :
00111 public ImageRegistrationMethod <TImage,TImage>
00112 {
00113 public:
00115   typedef RigidRegistration  Self;
00116   typedef ImageRegistrationMethod<TImage,TImage>       Superclass;
00117   typedef SmartPointer<Self>                           Pointer;
00118   typedef SmartPointer<const Self>                     ConstPointer;
00119 
00121   itkNewMacro(Self);
00122 
00124   itkTypeMacro(RigidRegistration, ImageRegistrationMethod);
00125 
00127   typedef          TImage                               ImageType;
00128   typedef typename ImageType::Pointer                   ImagePointer;
00129 
00130   typedef Image< unsigned char, 3 >                     ImageMaskType;
00131   typedef typename ImageMaskType::Pointer               ImageMaskPointer;
00132 
00133   typedef ImageMaskSpatialObject< 3 >                   MaskType;
00134   typedef typename MaskType::Pointer                    MaskPointer;
00135 
00136   typedef typename ImageType::PointType                 PointType;
00137   typedef typename ImageType::SizeType                          SizeType;
00138   typedef typename ImageType::IndexType                 IndexType;
00139 
00141   // typedef MattesMutualInformationImageToImageMetric<
00142   //typedef MeanSquaresImageToImageMetric<
00143   // FIXME Change metric to MI after testing NC
00144   typedef NormalizedCorrelationImageToImageMetric<
00145                                           ImageType,
00146                                           ImageType >   MetricType;
00147 
00148 
00149 
00150   typedef typename MetricType::Pointer                  MetricPointer;
00151 
00152   /* TODO: Check if better results can be obtained with other transformation types
00153      like VersorRigid3DTransform. The ITK user's guide says this transformation
00154      could have problems for large rotations */
00155 
00157   typedef Euler3DTransform< double >                    TransformType;
00158   typedef typename TransformType::Pointer               TransformPointer;
00159   typedef  TransformType::ParametersType                ParametersType;
00160 
00161   typedef CenteredTransformInitializer<
00162                                     TransformType,
00163                                     ImageMaskType,
00164                                     ImageMaskType >  TransformInitializerType;
00165 
00166 
00168   typedef LinearInterpolateImageFunction<
00169                                     ImageType,
00170                                     double>             InterpolatorType;
00171   typedef typename InterpolatorType::Pointer            InterpolatorPointer;
00172 
00174   typedef RegularStepGradientDescentOptimizer           OptimizerType;
00175   typedef typename OptimizerType::Pointer               OptimizerPointer;
00176   typedef OptimizerType::ScalesType                                                                             OptimizerScalesType;
00177 
00178 
00180   itkGetObjectMacro(Transform, TransformType);
00181 
00183   itkSetMacro(TransformCenter, PointType);
00184   itkGetMacro(TransformCenter, PointType);
00185 
00187   itkSetMacro(Iterations, unsigned int);
00188   itkGetMacro(Iterations, unsigned int);
00189 
00191   itkSetMacro(EnableObserver, bool);
00192   itkGetMacro(EnableObserver, bool);
00193 
00195   itkSetObjectMacro(FixedImageMask, ImageMaskType);
00196   itkGetObjectMacro(FixedImageMask, ImageMaskType);
00197 
00199   itkSetObjectMacro(MovingImageMask, ImageMaskType);
00200   itkGetObjectMacro(MovingImageMask, ImageMaskType);
00201 
00202   void InitializeWithTransform()
00203   {
00204     m_InitializeWithTransform = true;
00205     m_InitializeWithMask = false;
00206     m_InitializeWithRegion = false;
00207   }
00208 
00209   void InitializeWithMask()
00210   {
00211     m_InitializeWithTransform = false;
00212     m_InitializeWithMask = true;
00213     m_InitializeWithRegion = false;
00214   }
00215 
00216   void InitializeWithRegion()
00217   {
00218     m_InitializeWithTransform = false;
00219     m_InitializeWithMask = false;
00220     m_InitializeWithRegion = true;
00221   }
00222 
00223 
00224 
00225 protected:
00226   RigidRegistration();
00227   virtual ~RigidRegistration() {};
00228   void PrintSelf(std::ostream& os, Indent indent) const;
00229 
00232   void Initialize() throw (ExceptionObject);
00233 
00234 private:
00235   RigidRegistration(const Self&); //purposely not implemented
00236   void operator=(const Self&); //purposely not implemented
00237 
00238   MetricPointer        m_Metric;
00239   OptimizerPointer     m_Optimizer;
00240   TransformPointer     m_Transform;
00241   InterpolatorPointer  m_Interpolator;
00242 
00243   ImageMaskPointer     m_FixedImageMask;
00244   ImageMaskPointer     m_MovingImageMask;
00245 
00246   MaskPointer          m_FixedMask;
00247 
00248   PointType            m_TransformCenter;
00249 
00250   bool m_InitializeWithMask;
00251   bool m_InitializeWithRegion;
00252   bool m_InitializeWithTransform;
00253 
00254 
00255   unsigned int m_Iterations;
00256   bool         m_EnableObserver;
00257 
00258   CommandIterationUpdate::Pointer  m_Observer;
00259 };
00260 
00261 
00262 } // end namespace btk
